issue.subject: Reengineering Monitor authentication
issue.description:
The goal is to change way of storing MONITOR users/roles in database and authenticating beside MONITOR servlet.

* EasySDI account service should be used instead of specific MONITOR admin account.
* Specific MONITOR users/roles should be entirely replaced by Joomla access rights logical.
* Monitor propxy php file should build the http call to MONITOR servlet adding authentication login instead of defining directly authentication login inside MONITOR servlet URL configuration.
* Verify that SPRING security layer is fully intergated into MONITOR servlet to manage http basic protocol.
